actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, Treasury.
Referred to Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that a National Commission on Federal Spending Reform should be established.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should establish a National Commission on Federal Spending Reform to study the growth in Federal spending and to determine ways to bring the growth under control. Requires such Commission to transmit a report to the 99th Congress, when it convenes, and to the President containing the Commission's findings and conclusions along with recommendations for legislative action.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that a National Commission on Federal Spending Reform should be established.
